references.name: Edwin Timmermans, Warehouse supervisor for DHL Supply Chain at Philip Morris International
references.reference: The last couple of years I've worked together with Roel. We worked for different companies under the same umbrella but often needed each other's help. I found it very pleasant to work with Roel and could always count on a quick and neat solution for any challenges we had.

references.name: Kenneth Tobback, Teamlead on-site support for Econocom at Philip Morris International
references.reference: Roel always showed a high degree of professionalism during the period we have worked together, he has a strong customer mind combined with pragmatical approach on solving complex ICT issues in both office and factory environments. He has been a reliable resource to deliver high standard service. I strongly believe he is an added value to any organization.

references.name: Clemens Michael, Supervisor Logistics & Warehousing at Philip Morris International
references.reference: I got to know Roel as a true professional, but also a nice person to work with. His knowledge is at a high level, but most importantly he really understands and supports the internal customer! He is the ideal linking pin between user and IT department!

references.name: Talitha den Butter, Support Engineer at OfficeGrip B.V.
references.reference: Despite the short period we worked together, it was quickly apparent that Roel is a good teamplayer you can count on 100%. He doesn't run away from problems but goes out of his way to solve them.
